description.en: You won't be spending hours looking for this little guy anymore! It is your very own Mocomochi! This little guy will follow its owner around and pick up dropped items.
description.ar: You won't be spending hours looking for this little guy anymore! It is your very own Mocomochi! This little guy will follow its owner around and pick up dropped items.
description.br: Você não vai mais precisar passar horas procurando por esse bichinho! É o seu próprio Mocomochi! Este carinha seguirá seu dono e pegará os itens caídos.
description.cns: 你再也不用花几个小时去寻找这个小家伙了！它是你专属的摩可摩奇！这个小家伙将会跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Ein niedliches Mochomochi, der dir überall hin folgt und Gegenstände für dich aufsammelt.
description.fi: You won't be spending hours looking for this little guy anymore! It is your very own Mocomochi! This little guy will follow its owner around and pick up dropped items.
description.fil: You won't be spending hours looking for this little guy anymore! It is your very own Mocomochi! This little guy will follow its owner around and pick up dropped items.
description.fr: Invoque un mignon Bébé Mochikochi suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis.
description.id: Kamu tidak akan menghabiskan berjam-jam mencari si kecil ini lagi! Ini adalah Mocomochimu sendiri! Si kecil ini akan mengikuti pemiliknya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang yang dijatuhkan.
description.it: You won't be spending hours looking for this little guy anymore! It is your very own Mocomochi! This little guy will follow its owner around and pick up dropped items.
description.jp: かわいすぎるモコモチです。この子を探すのにもう何時間も歩き回らなくていいんです！ドロップアイテムを拾ってくれます。きゅん♥
description.kr: 귀여운 모코모치를 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: You won't be spending hours looking for this little guy anymore! It is your very own Mocomochi! This little guy will follow its owner around and pick up dropped items.
description.pl: You won't be spending hours looking for this little guy anymore! It is your very own Mocomochi! This little guy will follow its owner around and pick up dropped items.
description.ru: Зачем охотиться на кроллобков, когда можно завести собственного пушистого симпатягу? Он будет послушно ходить за вами и собирать предметы.
description.sp: ¡No vas a perder más tiempo buscando a este pequeño! ¡Este es tu propio Mocomochi! Este pequeño seguirá a su dueño y recogerá los objetos soltados.
description.sw: You won't be spending hours looking for this little guy anymore! It is your very own Mocomochi! This little guy will follow its owner around and pick up dropped items.
description.th: คุณจะไม่ต้องใช้เวลาหลายชั่วโมงในการตามหาเจ้าตัวเล็กคนนี้อีกต่อไป! มันเป็น Mocomochi ของคุณเอง! เจ้าตัวน้อยนี้จะตามเจ้าของไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 可召喚或解除可愛的摩可摩奇，召喚時會自動撿取周邊的的道具。
description.vi: Bạn sẽ không mất hàng giờ để tìm kiếm anh chàng nhỏ bé này nữa! Đó là Mocomochi của riêng bạn! Anh chàng nhỏ bé này sẽ đi theo chủ nhân của nó đi khắp nơi và nhặt những món đồ đánh rơi.
